<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/#a048d7ea6a08f90db101b47ef7222dcbc">AlignVectors</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This code tries to replace unaligned vector loads/stores with aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ones.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Consider unaligned load:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %v = original&#95;load %some&#95;addr, align &lt;bad&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %user = %v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It will generate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      = load ..., align &lt;good&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      = load ..., align &lt;good&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      = valign</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %synthesize = combine/shuffle the loaded data so that it looks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 exactly like what &quot;original&#95;load&quot; has loaded.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %user = %synthesize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similarly for stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/#a048d7ea6a08f90db101b47ef7222dcbc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/#a048d7ea6a08f90db101b47ef7222dcbc">AlignVectors</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/hexagonvectorcombine">HexagonVectorCombine</a> &amp;HVC&#95;) : HVC(HVC&#95;) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ByteSpan &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A representation of &quot;interesting&quot; bytes within a given span of memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These bytes are those that are loaded or stored, and they don&#39;t have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to cover the entire span of memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The representation works by picking a contiguous sequence of bytes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from somewhere within a llvm::Value, and placing it at a given offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// within the span.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The sequence of bytes from llvm:Value is represented by Segment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Block is Segment, plus where it goes in the span.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An important feature of ByteSpan is being able to make a &quot;section&quot;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i.e. creating another ByteSpan corresponding to a range of offsets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relative to the source span.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#aa8ce48899670ed2da3d6dd1f562b31a0">Segment</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Segment of a Value: &#39;Len&#39; bytes starting at byte &#39;Begin&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#aa8ce48899670ed2da3d6dd1f562b31a0"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#aa8ce48899670ed2da3d6dd1f562b31a0">Segment</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a7cece7285c41ad8efac8ad906646791a">Val</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Begin, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Len)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">          : <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a7cece7285c41ad8efac8ad906646791a">Val</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a7cece7285c41ad8efac8ad906646791a">Val</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a061743b1d11dd9c92319c52160830744">Start</a>(Begin), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#af723c36f8d7d9648f10b829aa50882e1">Size</a>(Len) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if !defined(&#95;MSC&#95;VER) || &#95;MSC&#95;VER &gt;= 1926</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VS2017 and some versions of VS2019 have trouble compiling this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// error C2976: &#39;std::map&#39;: too few template arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VS 2019 16.x is known to work, except for 16.4/16.5 (MSC&#95;VER 1924/1925)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pred, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... Ts&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/#a68730de8f6af0b0356aac875afbe86bc"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">erase&#95;if</a>(std::map&lt;Ts...&gt; &amp;map, Pred p)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pred, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">erase&#95;if</a>(std::map&lt;T, U&gt; &amp;map, Pred p)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = map.begin(), e = map.end(); i != e;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (p(&#42;i))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">      i = map.erase(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">      i = std::next(i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Forward other erase&#95;ifs to the LLVM implementations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/#aca2b0b97ce262f539dc770f4ff2c0d08"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pred, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">erase&#95;if</a>(T &amp;&amp;container, Pred p) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">llvm::erase&#95;if</a>(std::forward&lt;T&gt;(container), p);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// --- Begin AlignVectors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For brevity, only consider loads. We identify a group of loads where we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// know the relative differences between their addresses, so we know how they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are laid out in memory (relative to one another). These loads can overlap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be shorter or longer than the desired vector length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ultimately we want to generate a sequence of aligned loads that will load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// every byte that the original loads loaded, and have the program use these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loaded values instead of the original loads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We consider the contiguous memory area spanned by all these loads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Let&#39;s say that a single aligned vector load can load 16 bytes at a time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the program wanted to use a byte at offset 13 from the beginning of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original span, it will be a byte at offset 13+x in the aligned data for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// some x&gt;=0. This may happen to be in the first aligned load, or in the load</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// following it. Since we generally don&#39;t know what the that alignment value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is at compile time, we proactively do valigns on the aligned loads, so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// byte that was at offset 13 is still at offset 13 after the valigns.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This will be the starting point for making the rest of the program use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data loaded by the new loads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each original load, and its users:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %v = load ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ... = %v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ... = %v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we create</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %new&#95;v = extract/combine/shuffle data from loaded/valigned vectors so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            it contains the same value as %v did before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then replace all users of %v with %new&#95;v.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ... = %new&#95;v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ... = %new&#95;v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AlignVectors::ByteSpan::extent() <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>() == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Min = Blocks&#91;0&#93;.Pos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a81a0fae24e6bdfe240da4249a8da5978a6a061313d22e51e0f25b7cd4dc065233">Max</a> = Blocks&#91;0&#93;.Pos + Blocks&#91;0&#93;.Seg.Size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 1, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>(); i != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a92f4283d4e0e2ea1776894b3ae93640f">e</a>; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Min = std::min(Min, Blocks&#91;i&#93;.Pos);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For stores we need to be careful whether it&#39;s safe to move them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stores that are otherwise safe to move together may not appear safe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to move over one another (i.e. isSafeToMoveBefore may return false).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move all the loads (and dependencies) to where the first load is.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Created load does not have to be &quot;Instruction&quot; (e.g. &quot;undef&quot;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Loads(NumSectors + DoAlign, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We could create all of the aligned loads, and generate the valigns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at the location of the first load, but for large load groups, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// could create highly suboptimal code (there have been groups of 140+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loads in real code).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instead, place the loads/valigns as close to the users as possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In any case we need to have a mapping from the blocks of VSpan (the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// span covered by the pre-existing loads) to ASpan (the span covered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by the aligned loads). There is a small problem, though: ASpan needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to have pointers to the loads/valigns, but we don&#39;t have these loads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because we don&#39;t know where to put them yet. We find out by creating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a section of ASpan that corresponds to values (blocks) from VSpan,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and checking where the new load should be placed. We need to attach</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this location information to each block in ASpan somehow, so we put</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distincts values for Seg.Val in each ASpan.Blocks&#91;i&#93;, and use a map</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to store the location for each Seg.Val.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The distinct values happen to be Blocks&#91;i&#93;.Seg.Val = &amp;Blocks&#91;i&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which helps with printing ByteSpans without crashing when printing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Segments with these temporary identifiers in place of Val.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Populate the blocks first, to avoid reallocations of the vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interfering with generating the placeholder addresses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = 0; Index != NumSectors; ++Index)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ASpan.Blocks.emplace&#95;back(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, ScLen, Index &#42; ScLen);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = 0; Index != NumSectors; ++Index) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ASpan.Blocks&#91;Index&#93;.Seg.Val =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;ASpan.Blocks&#91;Index&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> createLoad = &#91;&amp;&#93;(IRBuilderBase &amp;Builder, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ByteSpan &amp;VSpan,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> this-&gt;createLoad(Builder, SecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, Predicate, ScLen, True, Undef,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move In and its upward dependencies to before To.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>-&gt;getParent() == To-&gt;getParent());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> != NumSectors + 1; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In ASpan, each block will be either a single aligned load, or a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// valign of a pair of loads. In the latter case, an aligned load j</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will belong to the current valign, and the one in the previous</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Place the load at a location which will dominate the valign, assuming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the valign will be placed right before the earliest user.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;PrevAt =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We know it&#39;s safe to put the load at BasePos, but we&#39;d prefer to put</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it at &quot;Where&quot;. To see if the load is safe to be placed at Where, put</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it there first and then check if it&#39;s safe to move it to BasePos.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, then the load needs to be placed at BasePos.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can&#39;t do this check proactively because we need the load to exist</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a> = WithMinOffset.Offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OffAtMax = WithMaxAlign.Offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Shift the offset of the maximally aligned instruction (OffAtMax)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// back by just enough multiples of the required alignment to cover the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distance from Start to OffAtMax.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate the address adjustment amount based on the address with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// maximum alignment. This is to allow a simple gep instruction instead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of potential bitcasts to i8&#42;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Adjust = -<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(OffAtMax - Start, MinNeeded.value());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AlignAddr = createAdjustedPointer(Builder, WithMaxAlign.Addr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      WithMaxAlign.ValTy, Adjust, Move.Clones);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Diff = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a> - (OffAtMax + Adjust);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AlignVal = HVC.getConstInt(Diff);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Diff &gt;= 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">decltype(MinNeeded.value())</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Diff) &lt; MinNeeded.value());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WithMinOffset is the lowest address in the group,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   WithMinOffset.Addr = Base+Start.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Align instructions for both HVX (V6&#95;valign) and scalar (S2&#95;valignrb)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mask off unnecessary bits, so it&#39;s ok to just the original pointer as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the alignment amount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do an explicit down-alignment of the address to avoid creating an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aligned instruction with an address that is not really aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AlignAddr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">        createAlignedPointer(Builder, WithMinOffset.Addr, WithMinOffset.ValTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             MinNeeded.value(), Move.Clones);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AlignVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aae2c1bf70058f3665edaec525457030c">CreatePtrToInt</a>(WithMinOffset.Addr, HVC.getIntTy(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;pti&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(AlignVal)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;Old, New&#93; : Move.Clones)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;replaceUsesOfWith(Old, New);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HvxIdioms::getNumSignificantBits(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;In) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    -&gt; std::pair&lt;unsigned, Signedness&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bits = HVC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/hexagonvectorcombine/#ae250333195d50ffcc282ad8d0dd1467e">getNumSignificantBits</a>(V, In);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The significant bits are calculated including the sign bit. This may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add an extra bit for zero-extended values, e.g. (zext i32 to i64) may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result in 33 significant bits. To avoid extra words, skip the extra</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sign bit, but keep information that the value is to be treated as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unsigned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a> Known = HVC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/hexagonvectorcombine/#ab855aa79aa2889254e75caeacc90a059">getKnownBits</a>(V, In);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Signedness Sign = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13faed3fa7a5efe80dad3ea3d86cc14be246">Signed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumToTest = 0; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Number of bits used in test for unsignedness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(Bits))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumToTest = Bits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Bits &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(Bits - 1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumToTest = Bits - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumToTest != 0 &amp;&amp; Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab6006923d1a3139d70abc8f6552a7960">ashr</a>(NumToTest).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a423e2c491de1408d54e35f0b47d076be">isAllOnes</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Sign = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13fac837bff23a12c3735d463020f37979de">Unsigned</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Bits = NumToTest;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the top bit of the nearest power-of-2 is zero, this value is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// positive. It could be treated as either signed or unsigned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pow2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(Bits); Pow2 != Bits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab6006923d1a3139d70abc8f6552a7960">ashr</a>(Pow2 - 1).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a423e2c491de1408d54e35f0b47d076be">isAllOnes</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Sign = Positive;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> roundUpWidth = &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Width) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the element width is not a power of 2, round it up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to the next one. Do this for widths not exceeding 32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(Width);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For wider elements, round it up to the multiple of 32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Width, 32u);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BitsX = roundUpWidth(BitsX);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BitsY = roundUpWidth(BitsY);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For elementwise multiplication vectors must have the same lengths, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// resize the elements of both inputs to the same width, the max of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculated significant bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Width = std::max(BitsX, BitsY);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ResizeTy = VectorType::get(HVC.getIntTy(Width), VecTy);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiply high</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WordX&#91;i&#93; &#42; WordY&#91;j&#93; produces words i+j and i+j+1 of the results,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If i is in &#91;Where, Where+Length), pick Src&#91;Start+(i-Where)&#93;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (b0, b1, b2, ...)    // the next lowest...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (c0, c1, c2, ...)    // ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of elements in each resulting vector is the same as</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do it by splitting in half, since those operations correspond to deal</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> splitInHalf = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Begin, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> End, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> splitFunc) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Take V = Results&#91;Begin&#93;, split it in L, H.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store Results&#91;Begin&#93; = L, Results&#91;(Begin+End)/2&#93; = H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Call itself recursively split(Begin, Half), split(Half+1, End)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2686"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the list of values does not have power-of-2 elements, append copies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the sign bit to it, to make the size be 2^n.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The reason for this is that the values will be joined in pairs, because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise the shuffles will result in convoluted code. With pairwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// joins, the shuffles will hopefully be folded into a perfect shuffle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The output will need to be sign-extended to a type with element width</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being a power-of-2 anyways.</span></CodeLine>
